original_text:
Maze Escape
Maze Escape Megaways è una slot online sviluppata da Fantasma. Le caratteristiche includono bobine a cascata, expanding wilds e giri gratuiti. L’RTP di questa slot ad alta volatilità è del 96,15% e il suo premio massimo vale 25.000x.
Il tema della Grecia antica potrebbe essere molto familiare ai giocatori di slot, ma ci si può aspettare un gameplay molto insolito quando si apre la slot Maze Escape Megaways. Creata da Fantasma Games, è un gioco a 6 rulli e Megaways in cui tutti i rulli si spostano di un passo a sinistra quando attivi la funzione Shifting Maze Avalanche. Sblocca i simboli speciali per far entrare in gioco altri extra, tra cui i wild impilati che vengono con moltiplicatori casuali fino a 7x attaccati. Attiva la funzione Labyrinth Free Spins e giocherai dei giri gratis con le Shifting Maze Avalanches che si attivano dopo ogni giro vincente. Anche qui potresti ottenere altri moltiplicatori. Scopri di più nella nostra recensione approfondita di Maze Escape Megaways.
Una grafica potente come Zeus
In questa slot online, il tema è basato sulla mitologia greca – e Fantasma ha davvero fatto le sue ricerche per assicurarsi che il gameplay fosse fedele alla leggenda del minotauro. Si basa sul racconto di Dedalo, che ha progettato un labirinto per intrappolare il minotauro, ma è stato anche imprigionato nel labirinto.
I simboli includono Dedalo e suo figlio Icaro, con il Minotauro che gioca un ruolo importante nelle caratteristiche bonus. Nel complesso, è una slot online dall’aspetto fantastico e Fantasma ha fatto un ottimo lavoro nel creare un gioco ispirato alla mitologia.
C’è una sensazione di alta qualità nel suono e nelle immagini della slot Maze Escape Megaways, che ha l’aspetto del migliore film d’animazione che tu abbia mai visto. Con un tema dedicato all’Antica Grecia, vedrai edifici di marmo in rovina sullo sfondo. In realtà, è ambientata in un Labirinto che è una struttura confusa la cui funzione era quella di contenere il mostruoso Minotauro.
Le immagini in stile cartone animato sono luminose, colorate e piuttosto ben fatte. Così come lo è il travolgente punteggio orchestrale che è diventato qualcosa di fondamentale per le slot con questo tema. È abbastanza orecchiabile e certamente aumenta l’atmosfera. Nessuna lamentela sul design di Maze Escape Megaways.
Le bobine sono composte da simboli di lettere greche di valore più basso, così come corone d’alloro, elmi, monete e asce e un trio di simboli di personaggi più paganti. Il dio greco barbuto è in cima alle vincite, assegnando 3 x la tua puntata totale se ne ottieni 6 in combinazione.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Nella posizione centrale sulla bobina più a sinistra, vedrai che una posizione è evidenziata. Se il simbolo che appare in questa posizione fa parte di una combinazione vincente, diventa il simbolo del Percorso e la funzione Shifting Maze Avalanche viene attivata.
Tutti i simboli Blocker e Minotauro vengono bloccati, i simboli Path corrispondenti vengono spostati nella posizione centrale sul loro rullo e i simboli rimanenti vengono rimossi. Tutti i rulli si spostano quindi di una posizione a sinistra. I simboli sul rullo 1 cadono dallo schermo e nuovi simboli e bloccanti appaiono nel rullo 6.
Ad ogni spostamento, 2 bloccanti casuali vengono rimossi. Viene quindi effettuato un nuovo calcolo della vincita. Se si forma un nuovo vincitore, il processo viene ripetuto. Questo continua finché non c’è una valanga senza una nuova combinazione vincente in mostra. Puoi attivare anche un paio di modificatori durante questa funzione. Per attivarli, apri i blocchi Athena o Minotauro.
Quando la funzione Guidance of Athena si attiva in modo casuale, tra 1 e 4 simboli Path vengono aggiunti alle posizioni vuote sulla griglia, aumentando le tue possibilità di creare una nuova combinazione vincente.
Quando il Minotauro viene sbloccato, si attiva la funzione Minotauro Wild. Il Minotauro riempie l’intera bobina, trasformandola in wild nel processo. Questo simbolo impilato viene anche con un moltiplicatore allegato che può essere qualsiasi cosa fino a 7x. Come altri simboli non bloccati, si sposta di un rullo a sinistra con ogni Avalanche durante il round.
Se sei abbastanza fortunato da far atterrare più di un Minotauro, il simbolo Wild, nella stessa combinazione vincente, i valori del moltiplicatore vengono combinati per dare un boost di vincita ancora maggiore.
Atterra 3 simboli Bonus nello stesso giro e puoi aspettarti 10 giri gratis nella funzione Labyrinth Free Spins. Qui, la Shifting Maze Avalanche si innesca dopo ogni giro gratis vincente, non solo su quei vincitori che includono la posizione del simbolo evidenziato.
I simboli bloccanti possono apparire sui rulli da 3 a 6 durante i giri gratis. Quando questi vengono sbloccati, possono aggiungere altri 1, 2 o 3 giri gratis al tuo totale o possono assegnare un boost al moltiplicatore di 1x, 2x o 3x.
Fantasma Games ha preso elementi del classico formato Megaways e li ha scossi per creare qualcosa di fresco e innovativo.
Il gameplay qui è certamente insolito e raccomandiamo davvero di fare un giro in modalità demo se ne hai l’opportunità, finché non ti abitui alle bobine che cambiano, ai blocchi e alle valanghe.

raw_translation.response:
Maze Escape Megaways is a top-quality online slot game developed by Fantasma. This high-volatility game features cascading reels, expanding wilds, and free spins, offering players a 96.15% RTP with a maximum prize of 25,000x.

The ancient Greek theme may be a familiar one for slot aficionados, but when you open Maze Escape Megaways, you will be treated to an unusual gameplay experience. Created by Fantasma Games, this 6-reel Megaways game shifts all the reels one step to the left when you activate the Shifting Maze Avalanche feature. Unlock special symbols to trigger additional extras, including stacked wilds with random multipliers of up to 7x.

Activate the Labyrinth Free Spins feature, and you will get to play free spins with Shifting Maze Avalanches that activate after every winning spin, increasing your chances of triggering more multipliers. Be sure to read our in-depth review of Maze Escape Megaways to learn more.

The game's graphics are as powerful as Zeus himself, with a stunning depiction of ancient Greece and the Minotaur legend. The cartoon-like images are bright, colorful, and well-crafted, with an orchestral score that adds to the immersive atmosphere. The game's symbols include low-value Greek letters, crowns, helmets, coins, axes, and a trio of high-paying character symbols. 

The gameplay mechanics are unique, with the central position on the leftmost reel highlighted. When the symbol in this position forms part of a winning combination, it becomes the Path symbol and activates the Shifting Maze Avalanche feature.

With the Guidance of Athena feature, randomly between one and four Path symbols are added to the empty positions on the grid, increasing your chances of creating a new winning combination. The Minotaur Wild feature transforms the entire reel into a stacked wild symbol with a random multiplier of up to 7x. 

If you land three Bonus symbols in the same spin, you will trigger 10 free spins in the Labyrinth Free Spins feature. Here, the Shifting Maze Avalanche is triggered after every winning free spin, not just on those that include the highlighted symbol position. You can also land blocking symbols during free spins, which add additional rounds or multipliers.

Fantasma Games has taken elements of the classic Megaways format and shaken them up to create something fresh and innovative. We highly recommend giving Maze Escape Megaways a spin in demo mode to get accustomed to the changing reels, blocks, and avalanches. For experienced gamblers looking for a unique and exciting gaming experience, Maze Escape Megaways is a must-try.

raw_translation.response:
Maze Escape Megaways is an online slot developed by Fantasma. Features include cascading reels, expanding wilds, and free spins. This high-volatility slot has an RTP of 96.15% and a maximum prize of 25,000x.

Players familiar with ancient Greece-themed slots will find an unusual gameplay in Maze Escape Megaways. Created by Fantasma Games, it is a 6-reel Megaways game where all reels move one step to the left when you activate the Shifting Maze Avalanche feature. Unlock special symbols to bring in more extras, including stacked wilds that come with random multipliers up to 7x attached. Activate the Labyrinth Free Spins feature and you'll play free spins with Shifting Maze Avalanches that trigger after every winning spin. Here, you could also get additional multipliers. Find out more in our in-depth review of Maze Escape Megaways.

With a powerful graphic like Zeus

In this online slot, the theme is based on Greek mythology - and Fantasma has really done its research to ensure the gameplay stays true to the legend of the Minotaur. It is based on the story of Daedalus, who designed a labyrinth to trap the Minotaur, but was also imprisoned in the maze.

Symbols include Daedalus and his son Icarus, with the Minotaur playing a major role in the bonus features. Overall, it's a fantastic looking online slot and Fantasma has done an excellent job in creating a game inspired by mythology.

There is a sense of quality in the sound and images of the Maze Escape Megaways slot, which looks like the best animated film you've ever seen. With a theme dedicated to Ancient Greece, you'll see marble ruins in the background. In fact, it is set in a labyrinth which is a confusing structure whose function was to contain the monstrous Minotaur.

The cartoon-style images are bright, colorful, and well done. So is the overwhelming orchestral score, which has become fundamental for slots with this theme. It's catchy enough and certainly adds to the atmosphere. No complaints about the design of Maze Escape Megaways.

The reels consist of lower value Greek letter symbols, as well as laurel wreaths, helmets, coins, and axes, and a trio of higher-paying character symbols. The bearded Greek god tops the payouts, awarding 3x your total stake if you get 6 in combination.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols
In the central position on the leftmost reel, you'll see that one position is highlighted. If the symbol that appears in this position is part of a winning combination, it becomes the Path symbol and the Shifting Maze Avalanche feature is activated.

All Blocker and Minotaur symbols are locked, corresponding Path symbols are moved to the central position on their reel, and remaining symbols are removed. All reels then move one position to the left. Symbols on reel 1 fall off the screen and new symbols and blockers appear on reel 6.

With each shift, 2 random blockers are removed. A new win calculation is then made. If a new winner is formed, the process is repeated. This continues until there is an avalanche without a new winning combination on display. You can also activate a couple of modifiers during this feature. To activate them, open the Athena or Minotaur blocks.

When the Guidance of Athena feature is randomly activated, between 1 and 4 Path symbols are added to empty positions on the grid, increasing your chances of creating a new winning combination.

When the Minotaur is unlocked, the Minotaur Wild feature is activated. The Minotaur fills the entire reel, turning it into a wild in the process. This stacked symbol also comes with an attached multiplier that can be anything up to 7x. Like other unblocked symbols, it moves one reel to the left with each Avalanche during the round.

If you're lucky enough to land more than one Minotaur, the Wild symbol, in the same winning combination, multiplier values are combined to give an even bigger win boost.

Land 3 Bonus symbols in the same spin and you can expect 10 free spins in the Labyrinth Free Spins feature. Here, the Shifting Maze Avalanche is triggered after every winning free spin, not just on those that include the highlighted symbol position.

Blocker symbols can appear on reels 3 to 6 during free spins. When these are unlocked, they can add another 1, 2, or 3 free spins to your total or they can award a boost of 1x, 2x, or 3x to the multiplier.

Fantasma Games has taken elements of the classic Megaways format and shaken them up to create something fresh and innovative.

The gameplay here is certainly unusual and we really recommend taking a demo spin if you have the opportunity, until you get used to the changing reels, blocks, and avalanches.

Players familiar with ancient Greece-themed slots will find an unusual gameplay in Maze Escape Megaways. Created by Fantasma Games, it is a 6-reel Megaways game where all reels move one step to the left when you activate the Shifting Maze Avalanche feature. Unlock special symbols to bring in more extras, including stacked wilds that come with random multipliers up to 7x attached. Activate the Labyrinth Free Spins feature and you'll play free spins with Shifting Maze Avalanches that trigger after every winning spin. Here, you could also get additional multipliers. Find out more in our in-depth review of Maze Escape Megaways.

With a powerful graphic like Zeus

In this online slot, the theme is based on Greek mythology - and Fantasma has really done its research to ensure the gameplay stays true to the legend of the Minotaur. It is based on the story of Daedalus, who designed a labyrinth to trap the Minotaur, but was also imprisoned in the maze.

Symbols include Daedalus and his son Icarus, with the Minotaur playing a major role in the bonus features. Overall, it's a fantastic looking online slot and Fantasma has done an excellent job in creating a game inspired by mythology.

There is a sense of quality in the sound and images of the Maze Escape Megaways slot, which looks like the best animated film you've ever seen. With a theme dedicated to Ancient Greece, you'll see marble ruins in the background. In fact, it is set in a labyrinth which is a confusing structure whose function was to contain the monstrous Minotaur.

The cartoon-style images are bright, colorful, and well done. So is the overwhelming orchestral score, which has become fundamental for slots with this theme. It's catchy enough and certainly adds to the atmosphere. No complaints about the design of Maze Escape Megaways.

The reels consist of lower value Greek letter symbols, as well as laurel wreaths, helmets, coins, and axes, and a trio of higher-paying character symbols. The bearded Greek god tops the payouts, awarding 3x your total stake if you get 6 in combination.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols
In the central position on the leftmost reel, you'll see that one position is highlighted. If the symbol that appears in this position is part of a winning combination, it becomes the Path symbol and the Shifting Maze Avalanche feature is activated.

All Blocker and Minotaur symbols are locked, corresponding Path symbols are moved to the central position on their reel, and remaining symbols are removed. All reels then move one position to the left. Symbols on reel 1 fall off the screen and new symbols and blockers appear on reel 6.
